description:
The Windows 10 SDK for Windows 10, version 1809 provides the latest headers, libraries, metadata, and tools for building Windows 10 apps.
### Note:
Windows 10 development targeting Windows 10, version 1903 (or later) requires Visual Studio 2017 (or later). This SDK will not be discovered by previous versions of Visual Studio.
displayName: Microsoft Windows SDK for Windows 10 and .NET Framework 4.7
summary: Microsoft Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 10, version 1803
author: Microsoft Corporation
